kitchen: Hey! Don't just go eating any old food you find lay'n about! That could be a clue to track down that foul beast...
What's that? The beast took captive your friends...? That's horrible!
It's settled! We shall work together!
I'm Hans. Should we cross paths again, I will come to your aid, little [color=blue]goat friend[/color]!
chef: A Goat! In the Kitchen! Unacceptable!
I've had enough of your mucking about!
